Scene:
The Tsubosaka Temple (See also The Mountain)
(Tsubosakadera (See also Yama) / 壺坂寺 (See also 山))

Play: The Miracle at the Tsubosaka Kannon Temple (壺坂観音霊験記)

Production: January 1972
